actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to study the feasibility of adding high occupancy vehicle lanes to certain freeways in southern California.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation, after consultation with appropriate State and local officials, to conduct a study of and report to Congress on the feasibility of adding high occupancy vehicle lanes to specified freeways in southern California.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to study the feasibility of adding high occupancy vehicle lanes to certain freeways in southern California.
